Key Arguments: The proposed legislation threatens freedom of expression and human rights.
Freedom to voice contrarian opinions and debate ideas is essential for a democratic society.
The Bill grants excessive power to the ACMA.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of expression and freedom to hear and boldly voice contrarian opinions, expression and thought, and to openly debate ideas is the bedrock of a free, democratic, scientific and civilized country and society.
Very simply put the Bill allows the ACMA too much power and I fundamentally oppose this Bill.
